reqs:
Pre-reqs: GEOB 270. (Or third-year standing in ENSC or GEOB specializations, with some introductory knowledge of GIS.)
Note: This course requires a $20.00 lab fee to be paid in the first month of class.
Note: This is a wait list for GEOB 370, section 101, Term1. You will be moved into active registration if space becomes available. Wait list does not guarantee placement in this course.
description: Theoretical and practical aspects of Geographic Information Systems, including cartographic modeling, digital terrain models, management issues, and spatial interpolation.
